text: Rabbi Menachem Mendel Schneerson (April 5, 1902 OS â€“ June 12, 1994) is the seventh and most recent designated leader of the Chabad-Lubavitch movement. Born in Imperial Russia, he emigrated and settled in the United States. Category:American rabbis Category:Congressional Gold Medal recipients Category:Writers from Brooklyn
title: Menachem Mendel Schneerson
